title: Caramelised red onion and goats’ cheese swirls
description: Goats' cheese and red onion are perfect partners in these impressive looking canapés. Best served warm on the day they are baked. For this recipe you will need a chef's blowtorch.
ingredients: 125g/4½oz strong white flour, plus extra for dusting
2 large red onions (or 3 small), thinly sliced
2 tsp beer vinegar (alternatively use red wine vinegar)
1 wheel of goats’ cheese (not too soft)
few sprigs fresh rosemary, torn into small pieces, to garnish
